downloadTitle: Value Stream Map sample diagram for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Analyze and help improve the flow of materials and information required to get your products and services to your customers with this Visio 2010 sample diagram.
detailsSection: Use this Microsoft Visio 2010 sample diagram to see how Visio can be used to help analyze and improve the flow of materials and information required to get your products and services to your customers. This sample shows how a soda manufacturing company created a high-level visual map of their value stream, from purchasing to production control to customer service. It provides key data for each role, including changeover time (C/O), shifts, uptime, and cycle time (CT), on a weekly schedule. This sample could be applied to virtually any other multi-stage process, such as a consumer goods order fulfillment process.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the sample diagram to your computer.
